tag.name: cfloop
tag.help: Different items are required based on loop type. Items listed as required may not be depending on your loop type. Loop forms: [query] [condition] [index + from + to ] [index + list] [collection + item ] [file + index + startline + endline]

parameter.name: index
parameter.help: Index value. CFML sets it to from value and increments or decrements by step value, until it equals to value.

parameter.name: startrow
parameter.help: First row of query that is included in the loop.

parameter.name: endrow
parameter.help: Last row of query that is included in the loop.

parameter.name: list
parameter.help: A list, variable, or filename; contains a list

parameter.name: delimiters
parameter.help: Character(s) that separates items in list

parameter.name: collection
parameter.help: The collection attribute is used with the item attribute. often to loop over a structure or array.

parameter.name: item
parameter.help: The item attribute is used with the collection attribute. often to loop over a structure

parameter.name: file
parameter.help: The filename of the file to loop through.

parameter.name: startline
parameter.help: First line of file that is looped through.

parameter.name: endline
parameter.help: Last line of file that is looped through.
